title: Bronze 2 Mid/Top (Mid preferable) looking for team or club
body: I am not a pro or ultra serious player. I play 2-3 games a day (sometimes more, sometimes less). Looking for a team, club or group with chilled laid back attitude to play together.

replies.body:
Hey

I am trying to get a bit of a team/community together for improving together.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/kaB0hk15-lets-make-an-improvement-focused-flex-teamcommunity-bronze-silver-gold
